_how to get the code from bazaar_

==== Details ====
- make a directory with the name of project
- bzr init _on the empty directory_
- bzr pull http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~username/projectName/branch

*Since You have a new sytem/ you would need a ssh key setup*
- visit the project page at launchpad
- go to key section _visible on the main page_
- generate a ssh+key https://help.launchpad.net/YourAccount/CreatingAnSSHKeyPair

- On the user-page 
	- edit the keys, you can if you want delete the old key, and add the new key, which you have generated on your machine 

now you are good to go.


do some changes or additions then 
- commit or add 
- push in the end.
